rev.comment: copy protection is not necessarily applied to copyrighted information/content

Line 2: Line 2:
{{Lead too short|date=May 2009}}
{{Lead too short|date=May 2009}}
â
'''Copy protection''', also known as '''content protection''', '''copy obstruction''', '''copy prevention''' and '''copy restriction''', is a technology for preventing the reproduction of [[copyright]]ed software, movies, music, and other media.<ref>Thomas Obnigene, [http://www.filmfodder.com/movies/dvd/glossary/glossary.htm DVD Glossary], filmfodder.com 2007. Retrieved July 19, 2007.</ref>
+
'''Copy protection''', also known as '''content protection''', '''copy obstruction''', '''copy prevention''' and '''copy restriction''', is a technology for preventing the reproduction of software, movies, music, and other media (usually [[copyright]]ed).<ref>Thomas Obnigene, [http://www.filmfodder.com/movies/dvd/glossary/glossary.htm DVD Glossary], filmfodder.com 2007. Retrieved July 19, 2007.</ref>
